references.paper_title: Phi-3 Technical Report: A Highly Capable Language Model Locally on Your Phone
references.reason: This paper introduces Phi-3, a large language model used in one of the main retrieval methods evaluated in the study.

references.paper_title: Qwen-VL: A Versatile Vision-Language Model for Understanding, Localization, Text Reading, and Beyond
references.reason: This paper introduces Qwen-VL, a vision-language model, that is relevant to the paper's focus on multimodal retrieval.

references.paper_title: PaliGemma: A versatile 3B VLM for transfer
references.reason: This paper introduces PaliGemma, a vision-language model, which is another key model used in the multimodal retrieval experiments.

references.paper_title: Dense Passage Retrieval for Open-Domain Question Answering
references.reason: This is a foundational paper in dense passage retrieval, a technique used and compared to in the presented work.

references.paper_title: ColBERT: Efficient and Effective Passage Search via Contextualized Late Interaction over BERT
references.reason: This paper introduces ColBERT, a model used in the comparative analysis of different retrieval methods.
